Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.player

Class PlayerLib

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.player.PlayerLib
public final class PlayerLib extends Object
Tiny player library to make player methods easier.

    • playSound

      public static void playSound(@Nonnull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nonnull org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch)
      Plays a sound to the player.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player to play a sound to.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.

    • playSound

      public static void playSound(@Nonnull org.bukkit.Location location, @Nonnull org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch)
      Plays a sound at provided location.
      Does nothing if the world is unloaded.
      Parameters:
      location - - Location to play sound at.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.

    • playSound

      Does nothing if the world is unloaded.
      Parameters:
      player - - PLayer.
      location - - Location to play sound at.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.

    • playSoundAndCut

      public static void playSoundAndCut(@Nonnull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nonnull org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch, int cutAfter)
      Plays a sound to a player, and stops it after a certain number of ticks passed.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.
      cutAfter - - Number of ticks to stop the sound after.

    • playSoundAndCut

      Parameters:
      location - - Location to play sound at.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.

    • playSoundAndCut

      public static void playSoundAndCut(@Nonnull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nonnull org.bukkit.Location location, @Nonnull org.bukkit.Sound sound, float pitch, int cutAfter)
      Plays a sound at a specific location for the given player, and stops it after a certain number of ticks passed.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player.
      location - - Location to play sound at.
      sound - - Sound to play.
      pitch - - Pitch of the sound. Will be clamped between 0.0f-2.0f.
      cutAfter - - Number of ticks to stop the sound after.

    • spawnParticle

      public static <T> void spawnParticle(@Nonnull org.bukkit.entity.Player player, @Nonnull org.bukkit.Location location, @Nonnull org.bukkit.Particle particle, int amount, double x, double y, double z, float speed, @Nullable T particleData)
      Spawns a particle for the specific player. Only the given player will see the particle.
      Parameters:
      player - - Player.
      location - - Location.
      particle - - Particle.
      amount - - Number of particles; Some particles might use this value for size.
      x - - X Offset of the particle.
      y - - Y Offset of the particle.
      z - - Z Offset of the particle.
      speed - - Speed of the particle.
      particleData - - Particle data.
